name: Fashonify.com
tag_list: fashion, review, polls, social, friends, decision, guidance, fashion-guidance
overview:
Fashonify.com is a social network helping you decide what to wear. By creating micro polls of two or more outfits, accessories, or really any styled item you own (or are trying on), you can get direction and feedback on which to choose from through friends, specific stylists, or the world at large. Whether you’re unsure of which outfit to wear on your first date, which hair style looks best for the summer, or which suit to wear for a wedding, you will have access to a network of people to help guide you.

Every day people struggle with which outfit they should wear, how to wear their hair, which accessories to pair with an outfit. So you have it narrowed down to a few options and you just need that extra push in the right direction. Fashonify.com is here to do just that.
